name: Don't Step on the White Tiles - Rainbow Edition
name_original: Don't Step on the White Tiles - Rainbow Edition
description:
Entry for Fuck This Jam, which is a game jam where in you make a game in a genre you hate.

I hate reaction games because I am really bad it. So I created a variation of Don't Step on the White Tile.

Since it's for PC, you utilize all your fingers to type on your keyboard to "step" on the colored tiles as fast you can.

Don't worry, you won't get penalized for mistakes, it'll just slow you down.

Hopefully whatever I created is just not fun to me (because I suck at it), and hopefully you guys would enjoy it.

Controls are from 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 and Space.

Developed in Unity by @purplelilgirl

Music is Flick3r by Joe Powell, Courtesy of Freesound

Piano sounds made in GarageBand­

Font is Keyboard Plaque by Andi Jones
